DOC.brief_summary: This observational , prospective , multicenter study describe mean dose Mircera ( methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta ) hemoglobin level patient chronic kidney disease . Patients dialysis naive , receive erythropoiesis stimulate agent treatment . Data collect 10 month .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Mircera ( Methoxy Polyethylene Glycol-epoetin Beta ) Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease Not On Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Adults patient , > /=18 year age Presence chronic kidney disease ( Stage 34 ) Participation another clinical study
